concept.title: Employment
concept.shortdesc: A procedure of hiring a person with disability

conbody.p: The procedure of hiring a person with disability when the company wants to use a multiple deduction method only slightly differs from the employment process of non-disabled person.

ol.li: The company hires a person with a disability and proceeds with usual formalities within the company

A person with disability provides a certificate stating that the person has a specific medical condition, however if the person has a statement of disability that has one of the codes used for the reasons for disability: 01-U, 04-O, or 06-E, no other document is required for the purpose of confirmation of the specific medical condition.

PFRON may enquire on what grounds the multiple deduction has been applied
provide PFRON with a specific medical condition certificate or a statement of disability, as applicable
Up to 20th day of each month a company has to fill in a form DEK-10 completing the number of persons with specific medical conditions

conbody.note: the company does not have to provide the spcific medical condition certificate until PFRON requests it.
